findings.title: Owner can change the tax, burn and liquidity fee.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tax, burn, and liquidity fee, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or users from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can include & exclude from swapAndLiquify (swapAndLiquify won't be called)
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to include and exclude addresses from the swapAndLiquify function, which may lead to unintended behavior since swapAndLiquify won't be called.

findings.title: Owner can change uniswap router & pair
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify Uniswap router and pair settings.

findings.title: Owner can change number of tokens to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the number of tokens added to liquidity.

findings.title: Owner Can Retake Privileges After Renouncing Ownership
findings.description: The owner can lock and unlock, allowing them to retake privileges even after renouncing ownership.
